languages.text: "Вы не совсем верно трактуете классика. Если подданные давно сжились с правящим домом — государю всего лишь не стоит поспешно преступать сложившиеся обычаи. Постепенно меняйте неугодные вам законы, как меняете русло разлившейся реки — и не утратите власти".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не совсем верно трактуете классика. Если подданные давно сжились с правящим домом — государю всего лишь не стоит поспешно преступать сложившиеся обычаи. Постепенно меняйте неугодные вам законы, как меняете русло разлившейся реки — и не утратите власти".

languages.text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."
languages.original_text: "Вы не совсем верно трактуете классика. Если подданные давно сжились с правящим домом — государю всего лишь не стоит поспешно преступать сложившиеся обычаи. Постепенно меняйте неугодные вам законы, как меняете русло разлившейся реки — и не утратите власти".

traits.locale_text: "You misinterpret the classical author's words. If the subjects have gotten used to the ruling House, all the sovereign has to do is not breach the long-established traditions. Adjust the unwanted laws slowly as you would change he bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take the power from you."

"You misinterpret the classical author's words. If the subjects have gotten used to the ruling House, all the sovereign has to do is not breach the long-established traditions. Adjust the unwanted laws slowly as you would change he bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take the power from you."

"Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling House, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

"Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling House, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

"Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

languages.text: “你对这篇经典著作的解读并不完全正确。如果臣民们已经习惯了统治者的律法，那么统治者要做的，就是避免破坏长期传统。当需要调整那些不受欢迎的律法时，要尽可能地慢慢来，就像在被河流淹没的河床中一样缓缓前进。只要这样，你手中的权力就不会被别人夺走。”
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

traits.locale_text: “你对这篇经典著作的解读并不完全正确。如果臣民们已经习惯了统治者的律法，那么统治者要做的，就是避免破坏长期传统。当需要调整那些不受欢迎的律法时，要尽可能地慢慢来，就像在被河流淹没的河床中一样缓缓前进。只要这样，你手中的权力就不会被别人夺走。”

languages.text: «Su interpretación de este texto clásico no es del todo correcta. Si los súbditos se acostumbran a la casa gobernante, todo lo que su soberano necesita hacer es no romper con las tradiciones establecidas. Si ajusta las leyes indeseables gradualmente, como quien cambia el curso de un río inundado, nadie le arrebatará el poder».
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

traits.locale_text: «Su interpretación de este texto clásico no es del todo correcta. Si los súbditos se acostumbran a la casa gobernante, todo lo que su soberano necesita hacer es no romper con las tradiciones establecidas. Si ajusta las leyes indeseables gradualmente, como quien cambia el curso de un río inundado, nadie le arrebatará el poder».

languages.text: 「この古典的な文章に対するカシア殿の解釈は、完全に正しいとは言えない。臣民が支配者に慣れ親しんでいるのであれば、君主がすべきことは長年の伝統に反することを慎むことだ。氾濫した川の底を移動させるように、不要な法律を少しずつ調整すれば、誰もそなたから権力を奪うことはない」
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

traits.locale_text: 「この古典的な文章に対するカシア殿の解釈は、完全に正しいとは言えない。臣民が支配者に慣れ親しんでいるのであれば、君主がすべきことは長年の伝統に反することを慎むことだ。氾濫した川の底を移動させるように、不要な法律を少しずつ調整すれば、誰もそなたから権力を奪うことはない」

languages.text: "Eure Interpretation dieses klassischen Texts ist nicht ganz korrekt. Wenn die Untertanen sich an das herrschende Haus gewöhnt haben, darf der Souverän lediglich nicht mit alten Traditionen brechen. Ändert ungewünschte Gesetze behutsam, so wie Ihr ein überflutetes Flussbett umleiten würdet, und niemand wird Euch jemals die Macht wegnehmen."
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Interpretation dieses klassischen Texts ist nicht ganz korrekt. Wenn die Untertanen sich an das herrschende Haus gewöhnt haben, darf der Souverän lediglich nicht mit alten Traditionen brechen. Ändert ungewünschte Gesetze behutsam, so wie Ihr ein überflutetes Flussbett umleiten würdet, und niemand wird Euch jemals die Macht wegnehmen."

languages.text: « Votre interprétation de ce grand classique n'est pas tout à fait correcte. Si les sujets sont habitués à la dynastie régnante, tout ce qu'il suffit de faire pour que nul ne conteste jamais le pouvoir en place, c'est de ne surtout pas toucher aux vieilles traditions ancrées dans le cœur des gens. Ajustez les lois que vous le désirez aussi progressivement et précautionneusement qu'on déplacerait le lit d'une rivière, et le tour est joué. »
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre interprétation de ce grand classique n'est pas tout à fait correcte. Si les sujets sont habitués à la dynastie régnante, tout ce qu'il suffit de faire pour que nul ne conteste jamais le pouvoir en place, c'est de ne surtout pas toucher aux vieilles traditions ancrées dans le cœur des gens. Ajustez les lois que vous le désirez aussi progressivement et précautionneusement qu'on déplacerait le lit d'une rivière, et le tour est joué. »

languages.text: "Bu klasik metni tam olarak doğru yorumlamıyorsun. Yönetilenler yönetici haneye alışmışsa hükümdarlar, uzun süredir ayakta duran geleneklere karşı gelmekten sakınmalıdır. İstenmeyen kanunları, taşmış nehirlerin yatağının değişmesi gibi zamana yayarak değiştirebilirsin. Kimse de gücünü elinden almaya kalkmaz."
languages.original_text: "Your interpretation of this classical text is not entirely correct. If the subjects have grown accustomed to the ruling house, all the sovereign must do is refrain from breaching longstanding traditions. Adjust unwanted laws as gradually as you would shift the bed of a flooded river, and no one will ever take your power from you."

traits.locale_text: "Bu klasik metni tam olarak doğru yorumlamıyorsun. Eğer yönetilenler, yönetici haneye alışırlarsa, hükümdarlar uzun süredir ayakta duran geleneklere karşı gelmekten sakınmalıdır. İstenmeyen kanunları, taşmış nehirlerin yatağının değişmesi gibi zamana yayarak değiştirebilirsin ve gücünü kimse elinden almaz."
